title: The system shall return the check total associated with the table record corresponding to the provided table index.
description: The system shall return the check total associated with the table record corresponding to the provided table index.

title: The system shall set the dessert to PIE when the entree is STEAK, the salad is CAESAR, and the beverage is MIXED_DRINK.
description: The system shall set the dessert to PIE when the entree is STEAK, the salad is CAESAR, and the beverage is MIXED_DRINK.

title: The system shall set the dessert to CAKE when the entree is LOBSTER, the salad is GREEN, and the beverage is WINE.
description: The system shall set the dessert to CAKE when the entree is LOBSTER, the salad is GREEN, and the beverage is WINE.

title: The system shall not modify the dessert when the entree, salad, and beverage do not match any of the specified combinations for included desserts.
description: The system shall not modify the dessert when the entree, salad, and beverage do not match any of the specified combinations for included desserts.

title: The system shall reset the waiting list index to zero when the waiting list is full before adding a new party.
description: The system shall reset the waiting list index to zero when the waiting list is full before adding a new party.

title: The system shall add a new party to the next available position in the waiting list when the list is not full.
description: The system shall add a new party to the next available position in the waiting list when the list is not full.

title: The system shall copy each character of a non-null, non-empty party name into the waiting list entry.
description: The system shall copy each character of a non-null, non-empty party name into the waiting list entry.

title: The system shall not copy any characters if the provided party name is null or empty.
description: The system shall not copy any characters if the provided party name is null or empty.

title: The system shall ensure that each party name added to the waiting list is null-terminated.
description: The system shall ensure that each party name added to the waiting list is null-terminated.

title: The system shall, when clearing a table, mark the table as not occupied and set the number in party to one.
description: The system shall, when clearing a table, mark the table as not occupied and set the number in party to one.

title: The system shall, when clearing a table, set all order fields for each seat to indicate no selection.
description: The system shall, when clearing a table, set all order fields for each seat to indicate no selection.

title: The system shall, when clearing a table, apply the clearing operation to exactly four seats.
description: The system shall, when clearing a table, apply the clearing operation to exactly four seats.

title: The system shall, when clearing a table, set the check total to zero and save the updated table record.
description: The system shall, when clearing a table, set the check total to zero and save the updated table record.

title: The system shall reset the waiting list index to zero if the index is greater than nine before accessing the waiting list.
description: The system shall reset the waiting list index to zero if the index is greater than nine before accessing the waiting list.

title: The system shall not modify the waiting list index if the index is nine or less before accessing the waiting list.
description: The system shall not modify the waiting list index if the index is nine or less before accessing the waiting list.

title: The system shall return the party at the current waiting list index and increment the index after returning the party.
description: The system shall return the party at the current waiting list index and increment the index after returning the party.

title: The system shall retrieve the table record, mark the table as occupied, increment the party size, store the order for the specified seat, and add a free dessert to the order if the order qualifies for one.
description: The system shall retrieve the table record, mark the table as occupied, increment the party size, store the order for the specified seat, and add a free dessert to the order if the order qualifies for one.

title: The system shall not change the check total when the entree is not ordered.
description: The system shall not change the check total when the entree is not ordered.

title: The system shall add 14.0 to the check total when the entree ordered is steak.
description: The system shall add 14.0 to the check total when the entree ordered is steak.

title: The system shall add 10.0 to the check total when the entree ordered is chicken.
description: The system shall add 10.0 to the check total when the entree ordered is chicken.

title: The system shall add 18.0 to the check total when the entree ordered is lobster.
description: The system shall add 18.0 to the check total when the entree ordered is lobster.

title: The system shall add 12.0 to the check total when the entree ordered is pasta.
description: The system shall add 12.0 to the check total when the entree ordered is pasta.

title: The system shall not change the check total when the entree value does not match any defined entree.
description: The system shall not change the check total when the entree value does not match any defined entree.

title: The system shall save the updated table record and return a success indicator after processing the order.
description: The system shall save the updated table record and return a success indicator after processing the order.
